cluster_relations.rel_desc: Advancements in technology greatly facilitate the spread of stories/urban legends.
remarks: Urban legends are a subset of stories; mapped to the stories entity.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: Communication processes facilitate the spread of stories/urban legends.

args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject process or factor causally facilitates or enhances the dissemination or spread of the object information or stories.
args.justification: Both relations describe a causal facilitation where a process (advancements in technology, communication) makes it easier for stories/urban legends to spread. A normalized predicate 'facilitates_dissemination_of' captures this general, reusable meaning better than reusing the noisy raw relation_name.

These edges link factors/processes to the enhanced dissemination of stories, focusing on causal facilitation of information spread. Grouping them under 'dissemination_facilitation_relation' captures this as a class distinct from generic causality or mere association.

The rel_hint_type and descriptions explicitly state that technology and communication processes facilitate (cause/increase) the spread of stories, which is a causal relationship rather than simple co-occurrence or classification.
